@Kami Nana The only borderline case was with his mom but then again she was perfectly willing and happy with it until she came to know he was the dude who beat her son up(read the dialog, though it was not shown she was clearly stated to be doing it with him before but wanted to stop once she came to know about the incident). And it was the childhood friend and her daughter who arranged him for her in the first place, he merely expressed his intent to want to fuck her(nothing wrong in it imo, every man, especially a horny high schooler like him wishes they could fuck a hot chick). In short the guy is really not a villain. Not even the slightest, unless you consider self defense and having sexual thoughts(quite hypocritical for such a person to be in a porn site though) an act of villainy. He didn't even 'steal' them from him, as far as he knows, it was his classmate, sister and mother, none of them romantically affliated with him, instead they came to him instead(Yes even the mom).

@Kami Nana  Think about it from that guy's perspective, all he did was ask some girl out in his class out and this white knight cuck tried to beat him up to impress her only to get beaten up instead. Then that guy's friend who has never seen such a strong man ever before(considering she's seeing the scrawny MC being beaten up for the first time) got mesmerized and fell for him. Then came that guy's sister who threatened him with group violence so again he acted in self defense and before long she embraced her gyaru nature and had a good fuck with him .

@Kami Nana The only real 'villain' here is the Osanajimi(who is probably a highly functioning sociopath who loves seeing him suffer, just look at that panel where she is enjoying the dude being so innocent while she arranged Tyrone for his mom back home) and to a lesser extent his mother and sister(who gave in to perverse lust over familial bonds, the mom was even sleeping with a guy as old as her son, only reason she wanted to stop was because she felt she had to be a mother first than a woman until she gave into lust and decided she don't need to). And all of them for toying with his emotions(The guy was never shown asking them to make the porno, they did it themselves and placed it in his room).
